mapper.select:
select
from t_product_info where f_product_id = #{0} limit 1;
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
UPDATE t_product_info
f_is_recommended = #{isRecommended},
f_product_name = #{productName},
f_product_desc = #{productDesc},
f_product_protocal_id = #{productProtocalId},
f_product_interest_way_id = #{productInterestWayId},
f_product_type_id = #{productTypeId},
f_repayment_way = #{repaymentWay},
f_is_flow = #{isFlow},
f_fix_rate = #{fixRate},
f_collect_rate = #{collectRate},
f_flow_min_rate = #{flowMinRate},
f_flow_max_rate = #{flowMaxRate},
f_flow_final_rate = #{flowFinalRate},
f_dead_line_type = #{deadLineType},
f_dead_line_value = #{deadLineValue},
f_is_collect = #{isCollect},
f_collect_begin_time = #{collectBeginTime},
f_collect_end_time = #{collectEndTime},
f_interest_way = #{interestWay},
f_valid_begin_date = #{validBeginDate},
f_valid_end_date = #{validEndDate},
f_buy_min_money = #{buyMinMoney},
f_buy_max_money = #{buyMaxMoney},
f_buy_total_money = #{buyTotalMoney},
f_buy_total_people = #{buyTotalPeople},
f_is_show = #{isShow},
f_show_index = #{showIndex},
f_tender_way = #{tenderWay},
f_is_redemption = #{isRedemption},
f_source_way = #{sourceWay},
f_money_type = #{moneyType},
f_risk_control_type = #{riskControlType},
f_risk_level = #{riskLevel},
f_flow_level = #{flowLevel},
f_product_manage_way = #{productManageWay},
f_status = #{status},
f_creator = #{creator},
f_create_time = #{createTime},
f_updater = #{updater},
f_update_time = #{updateTime},
f_remark = #{remark},
f_description = #{description},
f_buy_increase_money = #{buyIncreaseMoney},
f_cust_buy_max_money = #{custBuyMaxMoney},
f_product_illustration_url = #{productIllustrationUrl},
f_security_guarantee_url = #{securityGuaranteeUrl},
f_ransfer_protocal_name = #{ransferProtocalName},
f_ransfer_protocal_url = #{ransferProtocalUrl},
f_inv_label = #{invLabel},
f_lcs_label = #{lcsLabel},
f_sale_status = #{saleStatus},
f_activity_code = #{activityCode},
f_is_quota = #{isQuota},
f_begin_sale_time = #{beginSaleTime},
f_grey_flag = #{greyFlag},
f_open_type = #{openType},
f_open_linkUrl = #{openLinkurl},
f_buy_succeed_returnUrl = #{buySucceedReturnurl},
f_lcs_corner_ico = #{lcsCornerIco},
f_inv_corner_ico = #{invCornerIco},
f_inv_dtl_page_des = #{invDtlPageDes},
f_lcs_dtl_page_des = #{lcsDtlPageDes},
f_begin_sale_type = #{beginSaleType},
f_collect_line_min_value = #{collectLineMinValue},
f_collect_line_max_value = #{collectLineMaxValue},
f_collect_line_back_datetime = #{collectLineBackDatetime},
f_open_lcs_linkUrl = #{openLcsLinkurl},
f_collect_finsh_time = #{collectFinshTime},
f_end_sale_time = #{endSaleTime},
f_product_id = #{productId}

update.foreach:
update t_product_info
f_is_recommended = #{item.isRecommended,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_product_name = #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_product_desc = #{item.productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_product_protocal_id = #{item.productProtocalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_product_interest_way_id = #{item.productInterestWayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_product_type_id = #{item.productTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_repayment_way = #{item.repaymentWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_is_flow = #{item.isFlow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_fix_rate = #{item.fixRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_collect_rate = #{item.collectRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_flow_min_rate = #{item.flowMinRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_flow_max_rate = #{item.flowMaxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_flow_final_rate = #{item.flowFinalRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_dead_line_type = #{item.deadLineType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_dead_line_value = #{item.deadLineValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_is_collect = #{item.isCollect,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_collect_begin_time = #{item.collectBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_collect_end_time = #{item.collectEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_interest_way = #{item.interestWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_valid_begin_date = #{item.validBeginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_valid_end_date = #{item.validEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_buy_min_money = #{item.buyMinMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_buy_max_money = #{item.buyMaxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_buy_total_money = #{item.buyTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_buy_total_people = #{item.buyTotalPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_is_show = #{item.isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_show_index = #{item.showIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_tender_way = #{item.tenderWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_is_redemption = #{item.isRedemption,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_source_way = #{item.sourceWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_money_type = #{item.moneyType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_risk_control_type = #{item.riskControlType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_risk_level = #{item.riskLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_flow_level = #{item.flowLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_product_manage_way = #{item.productManageWay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_status = #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_creator = #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_create_time = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updater = #{item.updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_update_time = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_remark = #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_product_id = #{item.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_description = #{item.description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
f_buy_increase_money = #{item.buyIncreaseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_cust_buy_max_money = #{item.custBuyMaxMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_product_illustration_url = #{item.productIllustrationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_security_guarantee_url = #{item.securityGuaranteeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_ransfer_protocal_name = #{item.ransferProtocalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_ransfer_protocal_url = #{item.ransferProtocalUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_inv_label = #{item.invLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_lcs_label = #{item.lcsLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_sale_status = #{item.saleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_activity_code = #{item.activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_is_quota = #{item.isQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_begin_sale_time = #{item.beginSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_grey_flag = #{item.greyFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_open_type = #{item.openType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_open_linkUrl = #{item.openLinkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_buy_succeed_returnUrl = #{item.buySucceedReturnurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_lcs_corner_ico = #{item.lcsCornerIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_inv_corner_ico = #{item.invCornerIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_inv_dtl_page_des = #{item.invDtlPageDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_lcs_dtl_page_des = #{item.lcsDtlPageDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_begin_sale_type = #{item.beginSaleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_collect_line_min_value = #{item.collectLineMinValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_collect_line_max_value = #{item.collectLineMaxValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_collect_line_back_datetime = #{item.collectLineBackDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_open_lcs_linkUrl = #{item.openLcsLinkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_collect_finsh_time = #{item.collectFinshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{item.id}

mapper.select: select f_id from t_product_info t where t.f_product_name = #{0} limit 1

select
from t_product_info
1=1
AND f_product_name like CONCAT('%','${dt.pname}','%' )
AND f_dead_line_value = #{dt.pdeadline}
select t.f_buy_total_money from t_product_info t where t.f_product_id= #{productId}

SELECT IFNULL(MIN(t.f_show_index), 0) AS minSort FROM t_product_info t WHERE t.f_sale_status = 3 AND t.f_product_type_id = ( SELECT tpi1.f_product_type_id FROM t_product_info tpi1 WHERE tpi1.f_product_id = #{productId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lhlc_product.t_product_statistics tps, lhlc_product.t_product_info tpi SET tps.f_rema_money = 0, tps.f_buyed_total_money = tpi.f_buy_total_money, tpi.f_sale_status = 3, tpi.f_show_index = #{showIndex}, tpi.f_is_show = 2, tpi.f_remark = '手动产品更新为售罄状态', tpi.f_update_time = now(), tpi.f_updater = #{userName} WHERE tpi.f_product_id = tps.f_product_id AND tpi.f_product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.f_interest_way, f_buy_succeed_returnUrl, p.f_is_collect, p.f_collect_end_time, p.f_sale_status, p.f_show_index, p.f_is_quota, p.f_begin_sale_time, p.f_collect_rate, p.f_collect_line_min_value, p.f_collect_line_max_value, p.f_product_name, p.f_product_desc, p.f_product_type_id, p.f_repayment_way, p.f_is_flow, p.f_fix_rate, p.f_flow_min_rate, p.f_flow_max_rate, p.f_dead_line_type, p.f_dead_line_value, p.f_valid_begin_date, p.f_valid_end_date, p.f_buy_min_money, p.f_buy_max_money, p.f_buy_total_money, p.f_status, p.f_product_id, p.f_buy_increase_money, p.f_product_manage_way, p.f_is_redemption, p.f_cust_buy_max_money, p.f_product_protocal_id, p.f_product_illustration_url, p.f_security_guarantee_url, p.f_collect_begin_time, p.f_collect_end_time, p.f_ransfer_protocal_name, p.f_ransfer_protocal_url, p.f_inv_label, p.f_lcs_label, p.f_end_sale_time, ps.f_rema_money, ps.f_buyed_total_money, ps.f_buyed_total_people
FROM t_product_info p
LEFT JOIN t_product_statistics ps ON (p.f_product_id = ps.f_product_id) WHERE p.f_sale_status IN (1,2,5)
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_product_info
f_sale_status = #{saleStatus},
f_collect_finsh_time = #{collectFinshTime},
f_grey_flag = #{greyFlag},
f_show_index = #{showIndex},
f_product_id = #{productId}
